type.name: org.gradle.api.resources.ResourceHandler
type.description: * Provides access to resource-specific utility methods, for example factory methods that create various resources.

method.name: bzip2
method.description: * Creates resource that points to a bzip2 compressed file at the given path. * The path is evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)}. * * @param path The path evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)}.

method.name: getText
method.description: * Returns a factory for creating {@code TextResource}s from various sources such as * strings, files, and archive entries. * * @since 2.2 * * @return a factory for creating {@code TextResource}s

method.name: gzip
method.description: * Creates resource that points to a gzip compressed file at the given path. * The path is evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)}. * * @param path The path evaluated as per {@link org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)}.

property.name: text
property.description: * Returns a factory for creating {@code TextResource}s from various sources such as * strings, files, and archive entries. * * @since 2.2 * * @return a factory for creating {@code TextResource}s
